verses.kjv: And the word of the LORD came unto me, saying,
verses.ct: The LORD's message came to me:

verses.kjv: Son of man, set thy face against Gog, the land of Magog, the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal, and prophesy against him,
verses.ct: "Son of man, turn against Gog, of the land of Magog, the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal, and prophesy against him.

verses.kjv: And say, Thus saith the Lord GOD; Behold, I am against thee, O Gog, the chief prince of Meshech and Tubal:
verses.ct: Say, 'This is what the Lord GOD declares: Pay attention, Gog, chief prince of Meshech and Tubal — I oppose you.

verses.kjv: And I will turn thee back, and put hooks into thy jaws, and I will bring thee forth, and all thine army, horses and horsemen, all of them clothed with all sorts of armour, even a great company with bucklers and shields, all of them handling swords:
verses.ct: I will drag you back, putting hooks in your jaws, and I will force you out along with your entire army — horses and riders, all of them fully equipped with every kind of armor, a massive force carrying large and small shields, every one of them armed with swords.

verses.kjv: Persia, Ethiopia, and Libya with them; all of them with shield and helmet:
verses.ct: Persia, Ethiopia, and Libya will be with them, all equipped with shields and helmets.

verses.kjv: Gomer, and all his bands; the house of Togarmah of the north quarters, and all his bands: and many people with thee.
verses.ct: Gomer and all its troops, the people of Togarmah from the far north and all their troops — many nations will join you.

verses.kjv: Be thou prepared, and prepare for thyself, thou, and all thy company that are assembled unto thee, and be thou a guard unto them.
verses.ct: Get yourself ready and prepare — you and all the forces assembled around you — and serve as their commander.

verses.kjv: After many days thou shalt be visited: in the latter years thou shalt come into the land that is brought back from the sword, and is gathered out of many people, against the mountains of Israel, which have been always waste: but it is brought forth out of the nations, and they shall dwell safely all of them.
verses.ct: After a long time, you will be summoned. In future years you will invade a land that has recovered from war, whose people have been regathered from many nations to the mountains of Israel, which had long been desolate. Its people will have been brought back from among the nations, and all of them will be living securely.

verses.kjv: Thou shalt ascend and come like a storm, thou shalt be like a cloud to cover the land, thou, and all thy bands, and many people with thee.
verses.ct: You will advance like a storm, rolling in like a cloud covering the land — you, all your troops, and the many nations with you."

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; It shall also come to pass, that at the same time shall things come into thy mind, and thou shalt think an evil thought:
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD declares: "At that time, ideas will form in your mind, and you will devise a wicked plan.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt say, I will go up to the land of unwalled villages; I will go to them that are at rest, that dwell safely, all of them dwelling without walls, and having neither bars nor gates,
verses.ct: You will say, 'I will march against a land of unprotected villages. I will attack people who are at peace, living securely — all of them in towns without walls, gates, or bars.'

verses.kjv: To take a spoil, and to take a prey; to turn thine hand upon the desolate places that are now inhabited, and upon the people that are gathered out of the nations, which have gotten cattle and goods, that dwell in the midst of the land.
verses.ct: You will plan to seize plunder and loot, to attack the formerly ruined places that are now inhabited, and to strike against people regathered from the nations who have acquired livestock and possessions and who live at the center of the land.

verses.kjv: Sheba, and Dedan, and the merchants of Tarshish, with all the young lions thereof, shall say unto thee, Art thou come to take a spoil? hast thou gathered thy company to take a prey? to carry away silver and gold, to take away cattle and goods, to take a great spoil?
verses.ct: Sheba, Dedan, the merchants of Tarshish, and all their leading traders will ask you, 'Have you come to seize plunder? Have you assembled your forces to carry off loot — to haul away silver and gold, to take livestock and goods, to grab enormous spoils?'"

verses.kjv: Therefore, son of man, prophesy and say unto Gog, Thus saith the Lord GOD; In that day when my people of Israel dwelleth safely, shalt thou not know it?
verses.ct: "So prophesy, son of man, and tell Gog, 'This is what the Lord GOD declares: On that day, when my people Israel are living securely, won't you take notice?

verses.kjv: And thou shalt come from thy place out of the north parts, thou, and many people with thee, all of them riding upon horses, a great company, and a mighty army:
verses.ct: You will come from your homeland in the far north — you and many nations with you, all of them mounted on horses — a massive force, a powerful army.

verses.kjv: And thou shalt come up against my people of Israel, as a cloud to cover the land; it shall be in the latter days, and I will bring thee against my land, that the heathen may know me, when I shall be sanctified in thee, O Gog, before their eyes.
verses.ct: You will advance against my people Israel like a cloud covering the land. In the final days, I will bring you against my land so that the nations will recognize who I am when I demonstrate my holiness through what happens to you, Gog, right before their eyes.'

verses.kjv: Thus saith the Lord GOD; Art thou he of whom I have spoken in old time by my servants the prophets of Israel, which prophesied in those days many years that I would bring thee against them?
verses.ct: This is what the Lord GOD declares: 'Are you the one I spoke about long ago through my servants the prophets of Israel, who prophesied for years that I would bring you against them?'

verses.kjv: And it shall come to pass at the same time when Gog shall come against the land of Israel, saith the Lord GOD, that my fury shall come up in my face.
verses.ct: On that day — the day Gog invades the land of Israel, declares the Lord GOD — my burning anger will erupt.

verses.kjv: For in my jealousy and in the fire of my wrath have I spoken, Surely in that day there shall be a great shaking in the land of Israel;
verses.ct: In my passionate jealousy and blazing wrath I have declared: On that day a tremendous earthquake will strike the land of Israel.

verses.kjv: So that the fishes of the sea, and the fowls of the heaven, and the beasts of the field, and all creeping things that creep upon the earth, and all the men that are upon the face of the earth, shall shake at my presence, and the mountains shall be thrown down, and the steep places shall fall, and every wall shall fall to the ground.
verses.ct: The fish in the sea, the birds in the heavens, the wild animals, every creature that crawls on the ground, and every person on the surface of the earth will tremble at my presence. Mountains will collapse, cliffs will crumble, and every wall will crash to the ground.

verses.kjv: And I will call for a sword against him throughout all my mountains, saith the Lord GOD: every man’s sword shall be against his brother.
verses.ct: I will summon warfare against Gog across all my mountains, declares the Lord GOD. Each soldier's sword will turn against his own ally.

verses.kjv: And I will plead against him with pestilence and with blood; and I will rain upon him, and upon his bands, and upon the many people that are with him, an overflowing rain, and great hailstones, fire, and brimstone.
verses.ct: I will execute judgment on him with plague and bloodshed. I will pour down torrential rain, massive hailstones, fire, and burning sulfur on him, on his troops, and on the many nations fighting alongside him.

verses.kjv: Thus will I magnify myself, and sanctify myself; and I will be known in the eyes of many nations, and they shall know that I am the LORD.
verses.ct: In this way I will display my greatness and my holiness, and I will make myself known in the sight of many nations. Then they will recognize that I am the LORD."
